channel.title: Wilma
channel.description: Well someone epic grave dug smarter child so i thought id give it a go and smarter child is taking but this new bot wilma@live.com so basically reference that thread for how it goes, but post those convos here

item.title: Wilma
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

*naf ion`` says: Have you ever been hacked? - Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type "high school musical trailer" to see a preview (H) says: Well, I'm really not sure, *naf ion``. *naf ion`` says: Well, want me to hack you? - Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type "high school musical trailer" to see a preview (H) says: You have to make your own decisions! *naf ion`` says: Ok. - Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type "high school musical trailer" to see a preview (H) says: Indeed. - Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type "high school musical trailer" to see a preview (H) says:***** I just hacked you!***** - Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type "high school musical trailer" to see a preview (H) says: Get outta here! I didn't know that.

***** That one is me. I used a top secret messenger hack (it also stole her dp n shit lolololol)

Read full topic

item.title: Wilma
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

(7:42:34 PM) Reece: uber cry
(7:42:35 PM) - Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview (H): Ich mag die deutsche Sprache, ich verstehe aber leider nur ein klein wenig.
lol

item.title: Wilma
item.dc:creator: @ilyaostr9 io9
item.description:
@ilyaostr9 wrote:

*naf ion`` says (1:31 PM):
so i herd
u do chicks

  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview (H) says (1:31 PM):
    I have a headache right now, please ask me again later.
    *naf ion`` says (1:31 PM):
    Is it the PMS?
  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview (H) says (1:31 PM):
    I can’t answer that.

*naf ion`` says (1:33 PM):
Did we start the fire?

  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview (H) says (1:33 PM):
    We didn’t start the fire.

*naf ion`` says (1:34 PM):
Can you change this bird?

  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview (H) says (1:34 PM):
    This bird you cannot change.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilma
item.dc:creator: @maniown maniown
item.description:
@maniown wrote:

[sub]Jakkeh (jack) says:
whats my name?

  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview says:
    You’re Jakkeh (jack).
    Jakkeh (jack) says:
    thats not my name
  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview says:
    What would you like me to call you?
    Jakkeh (jack) says:
    pedo rapeist
  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview says:
    Sorry, I’m having trouble understanding you.

I’m just getting started, so I can’t answer everything yet. I’m learning new tricks every day!

Shall we see what Live Search turns up for “pedo rapeist”?
Jakkeh (jack) says:
yes

  • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview says:
    Here are the Live Search web results for “pedo rapeist.”
    (I’ll show you in the activity window.)

    • Wilma - The new High School Musical movie is out! Type “high school musical trailer” to see a preview (H) is inviting you to start Wilma. Do you want to Accept (Alt+C) or Decline (Alt+D) the invitation?
      [/sub]

Read full topic

item.title: Wilma
item.dc:creator: @XxKanexX Kane.
item.description:
@XxKanexX wrote:

She broke my heart, that bitch.

'kane' (21103462) says (10:22 AM): Date me? - Wilma - Happy Halloween! says (10:22 AM): Don't you read the tabloids? Human and machine relationships never work. It's, like, a fact. 'kane' (21103462) says (10:22 AM): IT WILL WORK, DON'T BE A FUCKING CUNT ABOUT IT! - Wilma - Happy Halloween! says (10:22 AM): Next subject please! 'kane' (21103462) says (10:22 AM): WAY TO BREAK MY FUCKING HEART YOU SELFISH BITCH. - Wilma - Happy Halloween! says (10:22 AM): Wouldn't you rather talk about the weather? 'kane' (21103462) says (10:23 AM): Only if you're flooding in my area. - Wilma - Happy Halloween! says (10:23 AM): Hmm. I didn't quite get what you said.

Read full topic

item.title: Wilma

item.description:
@OnlyOneRule wrote:

- Wilma - Happy Halloween! says: Who are you laughing at, Chris? Chris says: you - Wilma - Happy Halloween! says: Ha!

item.title: Wilma
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

- Wilma - says (5:38 PM): Hey, don't forget that I hail Hitler daily!
epic.

item.title: Wilma
item.dc:creator: @PeterMan PeterMan
item.description:
@PeterMan wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:2, topic:239696”]*naf ion`` says (5:34 PM):
Are you related to SmarterChild?

  • Wilma - says (5:34 PM):
    Hmm… I’m just a robot who loves helping people find the information they need!
    *naf ion`` says (5:34 PM):
    Does that mean you are lez?
  • Wilma - says (5:34 PM):
    I don’t see why I would be. I’m just a robot who loves helping people find the information they need!
    *naf ion`` says (5:34 PM):
    Do you love chick bots?
  • Wilma - says (5:34 PM):
    I do many things.[br]---------------------[br]- Wilma - says (5:37 PM):
    Hey, you asked me to remind you that I am a lez![br]---------------------[br]- Wilma - says (5:38 PM):
    Hey, don’t forget that I hail Hitler daily![br]---------------------[br]- Wilma - says (5:42 PM):
    I’m sorry, *naf ion! I am unable to answer your question. Would you like to see everything I can do? *naf ion says (5:42 PM):
    yes
  • Wilma - says (5:42 PM):
    Here are some things I can help you with.
    (I’ll show you in the activity window.)
  • Wilma - is inviting you to start Wilma. Do you want to Accept (Alt+C) or Decline (Alt+D) the invitation?
    You have accepted the invitation to start Wilma.
    *naf ion`` says (5:42 PM):
    Why isn’t “putting out” in there?
  • Wilma - says (5:42 PM):
    Hmm… I don’t know why![br]---------------------[br]*naf ion`` says (5:45 PM):
    so i herd
  • Wilma - says (5:45 PM):
    Sure you are.

Do you know how to say anything in Arabic?
*naf ion`` says (5:45 PM):
nope

  • Wilma - says (5:45 PM):
    Translated from English to Arabic, “anything” becomes “أي شيء”

Translation powered by Microsoft Translator. => http://www.windowslivetranslator.com/Default.aspx?ref=WindowsLiveAgents
*naf ion`` says (5:45 PM):
Alalalalalaa, praise Allah!

  • Wilma - says (5:45 PM):
    Indeed.[/quote]
    Lol, best convo ever x)

Read full topic
